description.para: Gets the remaining time before the Timer object times-out.

return.para: Remaining time before the Timer object times-out, in ticks.

remarks.para: This member function is used to get the remaining time before the Timer object times-out. Before invoking GetSurplusTicks, we must make sure that Timer object is cancelled, otherwise, it may cause unpredictable results. At this moment, if the Timer time-out period is not expired,then it returns the remaining time before the Timer object times-out. If the timer is already timed-out, this method returns zero.
